string-array.name: product_desc
string-array.item: Master Zephyr and Luffy figure from One Piece Film Z by Banpresto.
Setsuna Yuki from Love Live! Nijigasaki School Idol in idol outfit.
Qposket figure of Hakkai Shiba from Tokyo Revengers with signature expression.
Tokyo Revengers\' Mikey (Manjiro Sano) in Banpresto\'s classic figure style.
Detailed figure of Inosuke Hashibira from Demon Slayer in an action pose.
Adorable Chopper in the Fluffy Puffy figure line with a fuzzy texture.
Prize A figure of Tengen Uzui from the Ichiban Kuji Demon Slayer series.
Miniature chibi-style figure from the Monogatari Series Ichiban Kuji line.
Panel Spectacle version of Sasuke Uchiha from Naruto Shippuden.
Cute Nezuko Kamado figure from Sega\'s Noodle Stopper line.
Luffy in Gear 5 form from the Battle Record Collection series.
A bundle of collectible One Piece figures featuring various characters.
One Piece Ichiban Kuji Prize F figure of Crocodile in battle stance.
Monkey D. Dragon from One Piece in chibi Panson Works style.
Dynamic Rock Lee from Naruto Shippuden in mid-attack pose.
Tengen Uzui figure designed to sit on a shelf or cup edge.
Akaza from Demon Slayer, part of the SEGA SPM figure collection.
Son Gohan Beast form from Dragon Ball Z, sculpted in high detail by Banpresto.
Yuji Itadori from Jujutsu Kaisen, recreated in his iconic fighting stance.
Red DXF Grand Line Man figure of the Sunny Goon ship from One Piece.
A young eccentric boy very tall and like longganisa.
A very shin.y
